message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.MA, cs.PL, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with solution methods for decision processes, which are typically studied in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of temporal logic also suggests a connection to formal methods (cs.FL) and programming languages (cs.PL). The focus on translating non-Markovian rewards into Markov decision processes may also be relevant to control systems (cs.SY).
